waitlist.title: Stay Connected, Even at 30,000 Feet
waitlist.description:
The human side of flight tracking.
Turn every flight into a shared story with the people who matter most.
waitlist.problemSubtitle: Flight tracking shows data ‚Äî but hides the human story behind it.
waitlist.problem1: Loved ones refresh flight trackers obsessively, feeling disconnected
waitlist.problem2: There's no easy way to share the journey or calm their worry in real time.
waitlist.problem3: Missing the human connection during travel moments
waitlist.solutionSubtitle: We built Flightagram to bring back connection.
waitlist.solution1: Share your journey, not just your flight. Flightagram turns flight data into human moments.
waitlist.solution2:
Personalized messages that feel like you.
Set the tone for each recipient ‚Äî partner, family, or friend.
waitlist.solution3:
Updates delivered where you already connect.
Available on WhatsApp and Telegram.
waitlist.howSubtitle: Three simple steps to turn flight tracking into connection.
waitlist.howDesc1: Enter your flight once ‚Äî we'll handle the rest automatically.
waitlist.howDesc2: You choose who gets updates ‚Äî and how each message sounds.
waitlist.howDesc3: They receive thoughtful, real-time updates throughout your journey.
waitlist.earlyFeatures1:
AI-Personalized Messages
Each message is personalized for you ‚Äî supported by AI that adapts to your flight data, tone, and relationship.
waitlist.earlyFeatures2:
Customizable and Editable
Set the mood before takeoff ‚Äî tweak your message anytime.
waitlist.earlyFeatures3:
Live Journey Updates
From takeoff to landing ‚Äî your loved ones stay connected with you through every moment in between.
Available on WhatsApp and Telegram.
